definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes

sentences.english: The flight attendant served us a meal an hour after we took off.
sentences.chinese: 空服员在飞机起飞后一小时开始供餐。

sentences.english: Mike: Now that the flight attendant is gone, I can finally get some shut-eye .
sentences.chinese: 现在空服员走了，我终于可以好好睡一觉了。

sentences.english: A passenger told a flight attendant that she smelled something funny.
sentences.chinese: 一名乘客告诉空服员她闻到怪味。

sentences.english: Word has it that even models have registered to take this flight attendant exam.
sentences.chinese: 据说连模特儿都来报考这次空服员招考。

sentences.english: A flight attendant has just passed out immigration forms for entering the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 一名空服员刚刚分发了荷兰的入境表格。

definition: China United Airlines, abbr. for 中國聯合航空|中国联合航空[Zhong1 guo2 Lian2 he2 Hang2 kong1]

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: China Airlines (Taiwan)/abbr. for 中華航空公司|中华航空公司[Zhong1 hua2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1]
China Airlines (Taiwan)/abbr. to 華航|华航[Hua2 hang2]
pinyin: Zhong1 hua2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: student who also works part-time/(old) reform-school student
Hong Kong Dragon Airlines (operating as Dragonair), Hong Kong-based international airline
